comments: When the entire class shows up for 8:30 am consistently you know it\'s worth something. Amazing person and great Prof. Take the time to reach out to her if you have questions she will work with you.

comments: Not a good prof!! Not helpful in explaining assignments and lectures. tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Professor Lozanski was my first year sociology prof and is probably the reason I chose to continue my studies in sociology! She makes everything interesting and is there for support when you need it.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Professor Lozanski was by far my favorite professor this year. She was always eager to help students, reviewed concepts numerous times,formulated great class discussions and actually made lectures fun! I always looked forward to her class! Take her class, you won\'t regret it!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: interesting class, enjoy the seminar layout. however a bit of a difficult marker. also the presentation is difficult to do the first time because the format is odd (20 slides 20 seconds each) but other than that it\'s not bad

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Very good prof, taking time to learn peoples names, and them on a deeper personal level then most. She is fairly clear in her teaching and takes opinion of the class to heart. She has a good knowledge of sociology, and anything she doesn\'t know she looks up and finds for next class. Great Prof.
